comments.comment: Very Happy and quick progress by SL. But we need much more to play Our level of cricket.

Happiness üôåüòÑüôåwill last only till Mathews comeback. That Mathews fella will make sure we lose again.üí∞üí≤üí∞üí≤üí∞ üí≤ talks. Worst ever Sri Lanka Captain.üò±üò©üòûüò•. If Chandimal or Tharanga continues to be the captain we'll continue the winning streak. Simple as that.
Chandimal ek dina kandayame nayakaya wune tika dawasakata withrayi. Chandimal giyapu gaman supurudu awasanawa kandyama wela ganiwi, mata hithena hatiyayata.

Im not an Arjunas Political Fan. But I truely believe hes the best captain second to Dhoni. Such a Cool captain and won world cup for us with Just one or two big hitters in the side like Jayasuriya and Aravinda. He got amazing skills to manage his resources and pressuring any opponent. I wish Chandimal will be the next Arjuna for Sri Lanka cricket. Not politics such as Kicking out Dev watmore, roshan, Gurusinghe after the world cup win. As as a captain I Admire Arjuna as the best... good luck Sri lanka.. concentrate more on Singles and Strike rotation than 4 s and 6 s.. Good Luck. soooo Happy Guys. !

Luckily Mathews ruled out the series. If mathews captained rest of the matches we will never qualified to final. He has a good wining record when sanga, dilshan and mahela performing well. After their retirement he was helpless. We have never qualified to a final under his captaincy. Chandimal should be the captain till 2019 world cup. Anyway all credit should go to Hathurusinghe
Well done tawath, fielding ape best karaganna, wenawa.gunarhilaka and Aeselala,wage aya, ape Mahanama, DIlshanla wage hadagamu. Hathuru aka nubata barai. Then we will win India also.
Big thank goes to Hathurusinghe.
Congratulations !! Encouraging prospects

This is WHAT A GOOD COACH CAN DO.SE e NOW WHAT WILL FEEL ARJUNA RANATUNGA FEELS? WHAT ELSE,GELOUS,GELIOUS,GELIOUS,we don t care who else sit in the chairman seat,what we need is to become a cahampions of cricket

Hope we should drop Asela Gunaratne and includ Dhananjaya De Silva. Asela Gunaratne is not a technically good batsman. Tharanga played well but he dont take singles to rotate strike. Long way to go to come to the standard of AUS, ENG, SA and India. Well done coach and boys.

As I already mentioned several times here, Chandimal is the key person who can guide, manage, actuate & assist all the players for win... But a lot of people are unable to appreciate him or purposely forget him... But most Sri Lankan (who lost their conception & voice in all media) with Chandimal.... Do you think Hathuru could this job with other captain- Mathews, Upul or Thisara..... Never......

Coach knew bangladesh tactics!! Not some miracle by fat srilankan players

Yes in a way coach knew their weaknesses. Lot of rash strokes, wickets to bad balls. But the line and lengths were very good from the bowlers which made them go for those shots.  Overall Very good news after shit performance for about 2 years. Matthews needs to go as he keeps getting injured inside a match and his captaincy is really not good although hes the best batsman we have. All the batsman need to learn to rotate strike which was the cornerstone of Arjuna & Mahela's batting and made them match winners. (sanga couldn't do it earlier and learned it in the latter part of his career making him the great batsman he was)
I just watch a game that Arjuna lead the team to the win against SA 1992. He was a match winner good Captain.
